Overview.content:
OpenCms is open source. It is shipped under the GNU Lesser General Public Licence (LGPL) version 2.1 or later. So you are free to extend or modify it to adjust it to your requirements.

Development scenarios are different, and so are the recommended working environments. You may:

  • Set up your website with OpenCms without adding extra Java code
  • Add extra modules to OpenCms that include your own classes/libraries
  • Extend, fix or alter the OpenCms core

Explore the topic to find out how to set up a suitable environment for your scenario.
